name: vs tails secret history but on scratch
name_original: vs tails secret history but on scratch
description:
Miles “Tails” Prower, lovable hero and insufferable sidekick to Sonic the Hedgehog, or so the story goes. But all tales have two sides. Tonight on “Friday Night Funkin: Secret Histories,” we unravel the twisted tale of innocent infatuation turned deadly obsession.

game is free to play, so if you had fun and would like to keep up-to-update on the mod, make sure to support mod creators anyway you can, for example, subscribing, following, liking, their social media pages.

Mod is still work-in-progress. This mod will get multiple updates to try and get as many characters in (without over-doing it lol)
